d:
When Lida visits a small bakery, the owner offers her a “legendary croissant.”
Trusting and curious, she eats it without hesitation—only to be overcome by sudden drowsiness.

She wakes later to unfamiliar sounds and the owner’s presence, realizing something is wrong.
The bakery feels different now: doors closed, lights dim, intentions unclear.
Lida must piece together what happened—and why the croissant affected her at all.

✨ A mysterious opening about trust, hidden motives, and a bakery with secrets.
n: [Misc] Poke066 - Lida – A Bite of the Unknown – Light NSFW (Total: 305) (Patreon) [AI Generated]
